question: What is the derivative of a function with one variable?

answers.answer: How much the value of a function changes with respect to a change in its argument
The slope of a secant line to the function graph
The slope of a tangent line to the function graph
The intercept of a tangent line to the function graph

question: What is the gradient of a function with multiple variables?

answers.answer: A partial derivative of the function with respect to a single coordinate
A vector with all the partial derivatives of the function
The slopes of a tangent hyperplane to the function graph
The total derivative of the function

question: When a function is said to be differentiable?

answers.answer: If the derivative exists everywhere except on a set of measure zero
If the derivative exists everywhere (i.e., at any point of the domain)
If the derivative exists everywhere AND the derivative function is continuous
If the derivative exists everywhere AND the derivative function is limited in how fast it can change
